trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESGSC2017_00383_ADVENTURE00383_000_000<tab>Don't think I haven't noticed you admiring my outfit! I bet you'd like to know where I got my hands on it, wouldn't you? Pay a visit to Ul'dah, ask around, and maybe you'll be lucky enough to find out!

TEXT_FESGSC2017_00383_ADVENTURE00383_000_100<tab>I see ye too find me attire to be quite fetchin'. Where did I get it, ye ask? Well, it'd hardly be fun if I just told ye now, would it? Go on o'er to Ul'dah and find out fer yerself!

TEXT_FESGSC2017_00383_ADVENTURE00383_000_200<tab>I must say, that was quite something... What's that? Why am I elated so? Why settle for hearing about <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> dreams when you could be living out your own? Head to Emerald Avenue and try asking around!
